account_id.description: The account ID associated with this entry.

description.description: Description of the entry, providing additional context or details.

vat_code.description: The VAT code of this entry.

vat_rate.description: The VAT rate of this entry.

vat_method.description:
The VAT method for this entry.

* `0` - Bruttokirjaus
* `1` - Nettokirjaus

amount.description: The amount of this entry, in the smallest currency unit (e.g., cents).
